contents.title: What is this website?
paragraphs: This is an UNOFFICIAL tool to build lists for the Air Raid 36/46 game. All rights reserved to the creators.
For any questions about the rules of the game, contact the creators of the game.

contents.title: How to report errors on the website?
paragraphs: If you find any Error (bug) on the website, you can report it via Discord or GitHub by following the links below.
You can also communicate any new features you want implemented on the web.

contents.title: How to save lists?
paragraphs: The lists are simply saved with the corresponding button and are stored in the browser (Local Storage) so you can save different ones on each computer and browser.
To be able to share or export you only need the "id" of the list that you can find in the URL of said list just after "?id=". This link will be an exact copy of the list you are viewing onscreen.
By sharing this link, anyone can see this list.

contents.title: Who is part of the project?
paragraphs: If you want to collaborate either by modifying code or translating into other languages (or improving translations) use the same communication source as above, Discord or Github
